thread.title: Beautiful hotel right next the le arc on Champs Elysses
thread.title_full: Beautiful hotel right next the le arc on Champs Elysses - Review of Maison Albar Hotel Paris Champs-Elysees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: u0657041
title: Beautiful hotel right next the le arc on Champs Elysses
text:
The interior of this hotel is very lavish and feels very luxurious. Not to everyones taste but we loved it. Mirror on the roof, electric toilet. Our room was small but comfortable and had no view but for the price we paid it didn't matter. Still really good value. The location is excellent right next to le arc and there is bus stop a minutes walk away where you can get on the sightseeing bus and see all of the sights of Paris.
It was my 30th birthday trip and the hotel arranged fizz and macaroons for our room which was a lovely touch. I would stay again for sure.
Room Tip: pay extra for a view See more room tips
